entry.title: Cybersecurity 101
entry.content:
A beginner-friendly learning path in TryHackMe providing a strong foundation in computer security. It introduces core concepts in networking, cryptography, and operating systems (Windows, Active Directory, and Linux), while exploring both offensive and defensive security tools. The program also offers insight into real-world applications and career paths in cybersecurity.

Contents

  • Introduction
    • Offensive Security Intro
    • Defensive Security Intro
    • Search Skills
  • Linux Fundamentals
  • Windows and AD Fundamentals
  • Command Line
  • Networking
  • Cryptography
  • Exploitation Basics
  • Web Hacking
  • Offensive Security Tooling
  • Defensive Security
  • Security Solutions
  • Defensive Security Tooling
  • Build your Cybersecurity Career
entry.summary: beginner friendly path for a solid introduction to the different areas in Computer Security

entry.title: Blog Introduction
entry.content:
üë©üèª‚Äçüíª Welcome to my Cybersecurity Journey


This blog is where I document my path in cybersecurity ‚Äî from studying core concepts and exploring new tools to reviewing lessons and preparing for certifications.

It‚Äôs my way of tracking progress, sharing insights, and building a record of everything I learn as I grow in this field.

Along the way, I‚Äôll also share slices of life outside tech. I love reading, I‚Äôm learning how to bake, I‚Äôm exploring journaling, and I have a deep love for music. Expect book ratings, baking experiments, travel snapshots, food pics, and a little playlist inspiration sprinkled throughout the blog ‚Äî a personal touch alongside the cybersecurity content.

Currently, I‚Äôm reviewing Cybersecurity 101 with this TryHackMe path. You can follow my thoughts and progress here on this blog with the tag cybersecurity101 ! üê≥
entry.summary: tracking my journey, past, present, and future ‚Äî from my first steps in cybersecurity to everyday life, hobbies, and personal growth.
